prompt: Say 'Existing Reservation'. Then say 'Change Flight'. If asked for SkyMiles say 'No'. Transfer when human answers.
Say 'Track Bag'. Wait for agent. Transfer.
Say 'Flight Status'. Then say 'Agent'. Press 0 if stuck. Transfer.
Say 'Agent' immediately. Repeat 'Agent' three times. Transfer.
Press 0 immediately. If asked for PIN say 'I forgot'. Transfer.
Press 2 for Loss. Press 1 for Credit Card. Transfer.
Say 'Agent' repeatedly. Enter 0 if asked for account. Transfer.
Press 0 repeatedly. Ignore invalid entry message. Transfer.
Select Language. Press 2 (Personal). Press 1 (Form info). Press 3 (Other). Wait for agent. Transfer.
Say 'Disconnect Service'. Say 'No' to offers. Transfer.
Say 'Representative'. Ignore 'Go to App' message. Say 'Agent' again. Transfer.
